name: PaperCalc2
body:
* Go [back](http://hafiscz.github.io) to main page

PaperCalc2 is next reworked release of PaperCalc app. This time in C++ using wxWidgets instead of Java.

Grab a latest public release [here](https://github.com/HafisCZ/PaperCalc2/blob/master/PaperCalc2Preview.exe?raw=true).

Used libraries and apps:
* [Code::Blocks IDE](http://www.codeblocks.org/)
* [wxWidgets](http://wxwidgets.org/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
